fullDescription.intro: This node adds a Keras Alpha Dropout Layer to an existing deep learning network.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The drop probability (as with Dropout). The multiplicative noise will have standard deviation sqrt(rate / (1 - rate)).
The shape of the binary dropout mask that will be multiplied with the input.
Random seed to use for the dropping.

ports.inPort: The network to append the layer to.
